tool_description: Integral2u Sales ERP Tools. Provides enterprise resource planning tools for planing prices, costs, markups and dealing with money. Re-price Quotes by value. Planned Pro+ Customer discount planner to achive margin based on sales
name: Integral2uMoney
title: Integral2uMoney

api_list.name: ReduceQuoteByValue
api_list.description:
Attempts to reduce a quote by a given value. Decreases all sell until a defined min margin percent or 0% by default.
 the reduction value is always removed regardless of sign. Precision is defined most granular decimal place in all sells.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://integral2umoney.p.rapidapi.com/Prod/api/v1/pricing/reducequotebyvalue"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "integral2umoney.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
